mapper.insert: insert into merchantorperson_check_in ( merchantId, checkInType, linkmanName, companyName, companyCode, legalName, companyAddress, companyCreateTime, registMoney, charterPicUrl, idCardPicUrl_Z, idCardPicUrl_F, idCardPic, industry, checkInTime, checkInMoney, checkInMoneyStatus, checkInPayStatus, status, updateTime ) values ( #{merchantid}, #{checkintype}, #{linkmanname}, #{companyname}, #{companycode}, #{legalname}, #{companyaddress}, #{companycreatetime}, #{registmoney}, #{charterpicurl}, #{idcardpicurlZ}, #{idcardpicurlF}, #{idcardpic}, #{industry}, #{checkintime}, #{checkinmoney}, #{checkinmoneystatus}, #{checkinpaystatus}, #{status}, #{updatetime} )
